p: There are diffusionless shear mechanisms and diffusion mechanisms of the reverted austenite. The mechanism of reverted austenite formation has been explored by many works on supermartensitic stainless steel [ 28]. It is accepted that many factors, such as composition, heating rate, holding temperature, and holding time, determine the reverted austenite formation behavior [ 18, 23, 29, 37]. It can be observed that the higher the tempering time, the greater the amount of reversed austenite [ 22].
